description: driver seated on a carriage, LLC; man pulling cart, bottom center, with a walking woman; other pedestrians and horse at left; view of river with cluster of bare trees in ULC; buildings on opposite bank of river
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

LLC, in blue: [HD]; LRC on back, in black: [coll. André Barrier / achté à Lepère en 1910]; on back, in pencil: [152066]
markings: LLC below image, in red: [AL]; LRC and on back, in red: [AB]; see Signed
provenance: André Barrier, Lugt 70d (born 1870), Paris. [Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago, until 2009; sold for SOO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2009-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère no 15.]; on back, in pencil: [La Pointe de l\'Ille St-Louis et / quai de l\'Hôtel de Ville]
title: Tip of Ile St-Louis and Dock of Hotel de Ville
